full_text:
Case 1:19-cr-00490-RMB Document 36 Filed 07/24/19 Page 60 of 74 60
presumed innocent people in jail, whether it's Rikers Island or the MCC.
I again passionately urge your Honor to consider Mr. Epstein's release. Thank you so much for the time, Judge.
THE COURT: Thank you.
Anybody else? Did you want to comment?
MR. ROSSMILLER: If we could just briefly respond, your Honor.
THE COURT: Also I know if there are going to be any more submissions in response to today, can you do them by noon tomorrow? Is that reasonable?
MR. WEINBERG: 5:00 would be easier, given my travel obligations, Judge. And I do want to meet the government's reference today to a 1982 passport when he was 28 years old that expired over 30 years ago. I'd rather address that when I have some more time.
THE COURT: 5:00.
What about you, Mr. Rossmiller? Are you going to respond?
I don't know if there are open issues, but there are some instances where you're entitled to rest on the record, but the search of the East 71st mansion, there might be some evidence from that.
MR. ROSSMILLER: Your Honor, I can tell you certainly we'd be prepared to file anything additional by tomorrow at
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
(212) 805-0300
